settings.haircut-description-1: First time at Brothers? Then this is the service for you. The First Time Cut is a longer duration service but priced as a regular haircut for our new customers. This service provides sufficient time for a full consultation ensuring the perfect result.
settings.haircut-description-2: This is our regular haircut for everyday styles. Wash, cut & style from the finest barbers in town. Scissors, clippers & razors, you will walk out looking sharp and feeling fresh. This service includes a head wash & massage finished with products of your choice or with our recommendation.
settings.haircut-description-3: This is the service for SKIN FADES, LONG HAIR, RESTYLES which take longer than 30 minutes and gives the barber the right amount of time to give you the perfect cut every time. This service includes a head wash & massage finished with products of your choice or with our recommendation.
settings.haircut-description-4: A fine Buzz Cut, all over SINGLE-LENGTH (1mm, 2mm, etc.) Cut done with a taper only. (Always dry)
settings.haircut-description-5: Haircut for Gentlemen aged between 4 to 10 years
settings.trim-description-1: The full service beard trim includes a proper sculpting of the beard followed by a hot towel straight razor shave on the contours of the cheeks and neck. The beard will then be styled with the finest products from our selection.

settings.shave-description-1: Our signature classic straight razor service. Hand whipped lather & hot towels with a progression of fine products. This will renew your masculinity and leave your face feeling incredibly refined & refreshed.
settings.shave-description-2: Classic hot towel shave with a straight razor for the whole head!

settings.rule1-text: If you are more then 10 minutes late your appointment may be cancelled, as it’s not possible to give adequate service in the remaining time. If you are permanently late for your scheduled appointments, the Cancellation or No Show policies described below may be applied.
settings.rule2-text: If you need to cancel your scheduled appointment, please just let us know asap. We fully understand appointments sometimes need to be rescheduled or cancelled, and do not charge you if you cannot make it. However please try to understand that if you don't attend or let us know, it really hurts our barbers' livelihoods, so we just ask that you try to let us know asap.
settings.rule3-text: If you are more then 10 minutes late your appointment may be cancelled, as it’s not possible to give adequate service in the remaining time. If you are permanently late for your scheduled appointments, the Cancellation or No Show policies described below may be applied.
